TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit CngUIPolicy extends System.Object

summary.span: 將在您存取受保護的金鑰時，Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) 所顯示的使用者介面 (UI) 之選擇性組態參數加以封裝。

span.span: Encapsulates optional configuration parameters for the user interface (UI) that Cryptography Next Generation (CNG) displays when you access a protected key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個類別可讓您建立 UI 原則，顯示有關金鑰的作業，例如智慧卡 PIN 提示的提示。This class enables you to create a UI policy for displaying prompts about key operations such as smart card PIN prompts. 它也可讓您強制執行使用者互動才能存取金鑰，即使金鑰會儲存軟體金鑰儲存提供者 (KSP) 而不是在智慧卡。It also enables you to enforce user interaction to access a key, even if the key is stored in a software key storage provider (KSP) instead of in a smart card. CNG 在當您存取受保護的金鑰時，會顯示 UI 的這些組態參數。CNG displays these configuration parameters for the UI when you access a protected key.

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個建構函式 UI 提示案例中，設定金鑰的保護層級。This constructor sets the protection level for the key in UI prompting scenarios.
